Content: While I hate to talk about anything other than Sharur, earlier someone asked Will why they want to be governor and I'm going to bed soon so I guess I'll give my end first. |newline| While fircoal's point about the governor role being better for scum later in the game is valid, it doesn't mean we don't want town to be governor whenever possible.
